name: MANGO MAN (neilpotnis)
description:
In this game, Mango-Man, the character, has to collect all the sacred mangoes stolen from the Onion Clan and safely return them home.  The player will be able to move left and right with the arrow keys and jump with the space bar.  From levels three through five, the player will cross checkpoints so when they die they can respawn in those location.  The mangoes and the house will serve as an exit for the levels.

MUSIC BY HERE LIES (JACKY CHAO)
